summary: 移除ARMS Prometheus监控聚合实例的某些数据源。

schema.description: 集群ID列表，可以是多个，需要用英文逗号（,）分隔。

Success.description:
操作是否成功：

- `true`：操作成功
- `false`：操作失败

Info.example: {regionId: 实例所属region, globalViewClusterId: 实例Id, failedClusterIds: 添加失败的AliClusterId（一般是clusterId有误）}

RequestId.description: 请求ID，用于定位日志，排查问题。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "Data": {
    "Success": true,
    "Msg": "OK",
    "Info": "{regionId: 实例所属region, globalViewClusterId: 实例Id, failedClusterIds: 添加失败的AliClusterId（一般是clusterId有误）}"
  },
  "RequestId": "F7781D4A-2818-41E7-B7BB-79D809E9****",
  "Message": "success",
  "Code": 200
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<RemoveAliClusterIdsFromPrometheusGlobalViewResponse>
    <Data>
        <Success>true</Success>
        <Msg>OK</Msg>
        <Info>{regionId: 实例所属region, globalViewClusterId: 实例Id, failedClusterIds: 添加失败的AliClusterId（一般是clusterId有误）}</Info>
    </Data>
    <RequestId>F7781D4A-2818-41E7-B7BB-79D809E9****</RequestId>
</RemoveAliClusterIdsFromPrometheusGlobalViewResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 删除聚合实例数据源
